input.sentences: a man was preparing for his wedding .
him and his bride were overjoyed to say their vows .
the posed for some photos afterwards .
they made sure to get a photo with their wedding party .
the venue was set and waiting for them .
output.sentences: Ya'll, today was a beautiful day for my parents.
They decided after 60 years together, they were going to get married again!
I've never known a happier couple, and I'm glad they have been together all this time.
Being able to be a part of this means the world to me.
While the ceremony was small, everything was super elegant.
